      • messageReceived

        public void messageReceived(IOSession session,
                            java.lang.Object message)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: IOHandler
        Invoked when a message is received.
        指定者:
        messageReceived 在接口中 IOHandler
        参数:
        session - The session that is receiving a message
        message - The received message
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If we get an exception while processing the received message

      • sessionIdle

        public void sessionIdle(IOSession session,
                        IdleStatus status)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: IOHandler
        Invoked with the related IdleStatus when a connection becomes idle. This method is not invoked if the transport type is UDP; it's a known bug, and will be fixed in 2.0.
        指定者:
        sessionIdle 在接口中 IOHandler
        参数:
        session - The idling session
        status - The session's status
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If we get an exception while processing the idle event
